news_items.title: Apple unveils on-device AI upgrade for iPhone lineup
news_items.content: Apple announced a broader on-device AI rollout across iPhone and Mac, emphasizing privacy-first inference.

news_items.title: Analysts raise Apple price target after service revenue growth
news_items.content: Several top brokers increased target prices after Q4 results showed service margin resilience above 75%.

news_items.title: Tesla cuts entry EV price in China by 8%
news_items.content: Tesla reduced prices on key variants to defend market share amid local competition.

news_items.title: Battery supplier expands capacity for Tesla 2027 models
news_items.content: A major supplier announced incremental battery capacity ramp for 2027 deliveries.

news_items.title: NVIDIA data-center demand remains strong into Q1
news_items.content: Cloud customers continue accelerated AI cluster procurement with multi-billion dollar orders.

news_items.title: US export controls may tighten on AI chips to China
news_items.content: Officials discussed stricter controls for advanced semiconductor exports targeting H20 and above.

news_items.title: Microsoft expands enterprise Copilot tiers for mid-market
news_items.content: New pricing tiers target mid-market clients with lower entry points and bundled Teams integration.

news_items.title: Azure commercial backlog indicates stable double-digit growth
news_items.content: Channel checks and SEC filings suggest healthy commercial cloud backlog exceeding $250 billion.

news_items.title: Amazon logistics automation cuts fulfillment cost per unit
news_items.content: Warehouse robotics programs reduced cost-per-unit fulfillment by an estimated 12%.

news_items.title: AWS introduces ultra-low-latency inference endpoints for finance
news_items.content: New endpoints promise sub-50ms response targeting HFT and retail banking workloads.

news_items.title: Meta raises 2026 capex guidance by $15B for AI infrastructure
news_items.content: Capex uplift tied to AI training clusters and next-gen Llama model development.

news_items.title: Meta advertiser conversion rates improve with new AI optimization
news_items.content: Q4 advertiser survey shows 18% lift in conversion rates attributed to AI ad tools.

news_items.title: Alibaba Cloud launches enterprise LLM toolkit Qwen-Enterprise
news_items.content: Toolkit targets faster model fine-tuning and deployment for Fortune 500 clients in Asia.

news_items.title: China retail sales data mixed in January amid uneven recovery
news_items.content: Macro indicators showed divergence between premium and value segments in discretionary spending.

news_items.title: 贵州茅台2025年营收超预期，全年归母净利润同比增长16%
news_items.content: 公司发布年报，营收同比增长14.2%，超市场一致预期，经销商渠道价格略有回升。

news_items.title: 茅台宣布提高i茅台直销比例至30%
news_items.content: 公司官方宣布进一步提升直销收入占比，有助于改善毛利结构。

news_items.title: 五粮液一季度开门红，批价小幅回升至930元附近
news_items.content: 渠道调研显示五粮液普五批价环比回升约2%，库存压力有所缓解。

news_items.title: 白酒板块调整压力仍大，机构减持情绪明显
news_items.content: 近期基金持仓数据显示白酒整体持仓比例降至历史低位区间。

news_items.title: BYD January NEV shipments hit record 500k units
news_items.content: Strong domestic and export demand drove month-over-month shipment gains across all EV segments.

news_items.title: BYD battery cost declines support margin outlook for 2026
news_items.content: Raw material procurement improvements and cell efficiency gains expected to sustain gross margin above 20%.

news_items.title: Temu cross-border GMV accelerates ahead of seasonal promotions
news_items.content: Marketplace volume rose 40% YoY in January driven by US and European demand.

news_items.title: PDD logistics bottlenecks easing as freight rates normalize
news_items.content: Freight route normalization in major hubs improved delivery predictability for cross-border orders.

news_items.title: Temu cross-border orders surge ahead of spring promotion season
news_items.content: GMV growth accelerated with new merchant onboarding in EU markets showing strong conversion.

news_items.title: Google faces EU antitrust fine of €4.5B over search dominance
news_items.content: European Commission issued a preliminary finding that Google abused its dominant search position.

news_items.title: Gemini 2.0 Ultra outperforms GPT-4o on MMLU benchmark
news_items.content: Internal evals show Gemini 2.0 Ultra achieving 91.2% on MMLU, slightly above GPT-4o's 90.8%.

news_items.title: JPMorgan Q4 net interest income beats on rate hold
news_items.content: NII came in at $23.5B, above consensus of $22.8B, as Fed held rates steady through Q4.

news_items.title: JPMorgan raises dividend by 8% to $1.40 per share
news_items.content: Board approved increased quarterly dividend reflecting strong capital ratios above regulatory minimums.

news_items.title: ExxonMobil Permian Basin output reaches record 1.6M boe/d
news_items.content: Strong Permian production drove overall upstream volume to highest level since 2010.

news_items.title: Oil prices slide as OPEC+ signals production increase
news_items.content: Brent crude fell 2.3% after OPEC+ announcement of gradual production unwinding starting March.

news_items.title: Tencent gaming pipeline beats expectations with two AAA titles
news_items.content: Upcoming Honor of Kings sequel and overseas FPS title expected to support Q1 bookings.

news_items.title: Regulatory guidance on minors gaming hours unchanged this quarter
news_items.content: No major new policy shift announced; existing time and spending caps remain in place.

news_items.title: TSMC Arizona fab begins 3nm risk production ahead of schedule
news_items.content: Arizona N3 risk production started two months early, boosting investor confidence in US expansion.

news_items.title: TSMC raises 2026 capex to $40B citing AI chip demand surge
news_items.content: Management guided capex increase of 25% YoY to meet surging CoWoS packaging demand.

news_items.title: ARM royalty revenue grows 35% driven by smartphone AI chip adoption
news_items.content: Higher-value v9 architecture licensing now accounts for 60% of royalty revenue base.

news_items.title: Intel loses second major fab customer to TSMC in six months
news_items.content: A top-5 semiconductor designer shifted advanced node production to TSMC N2 over Intel 18A.

news_items.title: Intel CEO confirms foundry division restructuring, 15k job cuts
news_items.content: Pat Gelsinger outlined plan to reduce headcount in foundry operations while preserving R&D.

news_items.title: 比亚迪发布第五代DM混动技术，油耗降至2.9L/100km
news_items.content: 新一代DM系统综合热效率达46.06%，满足最严苛的欧VI排放标准，预计2026年Q2量产。

news_items.title: 比亚迪海外销量1月突破10万辆，欧洲市场增长最快
news_items.content: 欧洲市场同比增长320%，东南亚市场受本地品牌竞争增速有所放缓。
